meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the playing of a keyboard instrument.
meanings.sent1: Her clavieristic skills were evident as she effortlessly played the piano.
meanings.sent2: The musician's clavieristic performance captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: His clavieristic finesse on the keys always brought a smile to our faces.
meanings.sent4: The clavieristic melody danced through the room, enchanting all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The clavieristic touch of her fingers created magic in the air.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the technique or style of playing a keyboard instrument.
meanings.sent1: The clavieristic approach he used added depth to his music.
meanings.sent2: She studied the clavieristic nuances of different pianists.
meanings.sent3: His clavieristic flair on the keys always impressed his peers.
meanings.sent4: The clavieristic interpretation of the piece was both unique and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The clavieristic intricacies of the composition were beautifully executed.

meanings.definition: A person skilled in playing a keyboard instrument.
meanings.sent1: The clavieristic performed a stunning recital at the concert hall.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to become a renowned clavieristic in the music industry.
meanings.sent3: The clavieristic's fingers moved with grace and precision on the keys.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, the clavieristic is a respected and admired figure.
meanings.sent5: The young clavieristic practiced diligently to perfect their craft.
